pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Roleplay CogThis package is a cog edition of [my roleplay bot repository](https://github.com/mariohero24/Roleplay-Bot) that has been heavily modified## Installation```cspip install roleplaycog```## Setup```pyimport discordbot = discord.Bot()# Loading via the setup functionbot.load_extension("roleplaycog")# Loading directly (why would you do this)from roleplaycog import Roleplaybot.add_cog(Roleplay(bot))bot.run("Token")```
